rows.label: tlk43400046_01_msg0001
rows.name:
The trust you have between Blade
and Driver...isn't bad at all!

rows.label: tlk43400046_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I know, 'cos my dad has a merc
group, so it's something I've seen often.

rows.label: tlk43400046_01_msg0003
rows.name:
During a battle, a Driver's inner
strength grows.

rows.label: tlk43400046_01_msg0004
rows.name:
And at the same time, the Blade's bond
of trust with the Driver deepens.

rows.label: tlk43400046_01_msg0005
rows.name:
You both gain something by heading
out onto the field of battle together.
